items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: A library for managing and communicating events in your application through a singleton pattern. This pattern ensures that there is a single instance of the event manager, making it easy to coordinate and handle events across different parts of your codebase.

items.content_html: Lightweight clone of bit.ly written on Express Node.js, in Typescript, deployment-ready to Azure Web Service. Express routing is auto-generated when changes are made to a config mapping file of short-link to target full URL.
